title: Background
text: following formalism taken [1]. Define D={Y,X}D = \{Y,X\} n×mn \times m data matrix consisting n×m−1n \times m-1 predictor (XX) n×1n \times 1 target (YY) variables. Note authors consider DD tuple [2]. Also define MM n×mn \times m missingness indicator matrix. element 11 00 corresponding observed missing values DD respectively. Finally, define DobsD_{obs} DmisD_{mis} observed missing portions DD. way, DD can loosely partitioned D={Dobs,Dmis}D = \{D_{obs}, D_{mis}\}. definitions MCAR, MAR, MNAR based probability distribution MM. P(M|D)=P(M)P(M|D) = P(M) P(M|D)=P(M|Dobs)P(M|D) = P(M|D_{obs}) P(M|D)=P(M|D)P(M|D) = P(M|D) summarised informally [1].
